casebody.data:
ARMSTRONG
v.
KNIGHT. No. 501P06-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. Thomasine E. Moore, Jacksonville, for Knight.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 9th day of February *7642007 by Plaintiff for "Petition for Rehearing":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of May 2007."
